お会式: (おえしき) - (Nichiren Buddhism) memorial service for Nichiren (13th day of 10th month)
お伽の国: (おとぎのくに) - fairyland; never-never land
お使: (おつかい) - errand/mission/going as envoy; messenger/bearer/errand boy/errand girl; familiar spirit
お使い: (おつかい) - errand/mission/going as envoy; messenger/bearer/errand boy/errand girl; familiar spirit
お侠: (おきゃん) - pert girl; girl with "attitude"; lively minx; tomboy
お倉: (オクラ) - shelving (a play, movie, etc.)/closing down/cancelling/canceling/shelf (i.e. "on the shelf"); rice storehouse of the Edo shogunate
お偉いさん: (おエライさん) - big shot; higher-ups
お偉方: (おえらがた) - superiors; very important persons; VIPs; dignitaries; big shots
お元気ですか: (おげんきですか) - how are you?
お兄さん: (おにいさん) - older brother/elder brother; (vocative) young man/buddy/fella/laddie
お兄ちゃん: (おにいちゃん) - familiar form of "older brother"; form of address for young adult male/mister
お兄系: (おにいけい) - men's fashion style characterized by brown hair and deep-tanned skin, expensive brand-name clothes and accessories
お先に: (おさきに) - before/previously; ahead; Pardon me for leaving (before you)
お先に失礼します: (おさきにしつれいします) - pardon me for leaving (first) (used when leaving a workplace while others remain)
お先棒: (おさきぼう) - a person whose services are at the disposal of another
お先棒を担ぐ: (おさきぼうをかつぐ) - to be a willing cats-paw or tool for a person
お先真っ暗: (おさきまっくら) - (of the future) very bleak; dim
お八: (おやつ) - between-meal snack; mid-afternoon (around 3 o'clock) snack/afternoon refreshment/afternoon tea
お八つ: (おやつ) - between-meal snack; mid-afternoon (around 3 o'clock) snack/afternoon refreshment/afternoon tea
お内: (おうち) - home; your home; your group; their home
お内儀さん: (おかみさん) - missus (orig. honorific, now familiar); missis
お冠: (おかんむり) - bad temper; bad mood
お冷: (おひや) - cold (drinking) water; cold boiled rice
お冷や: (おひや) - cold (drinking) water; cold boiled rice
お凸: (おでこ) - brow/forehead; prominent forehead/beetle brow; not catching anything (in fishing)
お出かけ: (おでかけ) - (oft. used as a greeting in the form of お出かけですか？)  about to start out/just about to leave or go out; outing/trip
お出で: (おいで) - coming/going/being (somewhere); (used as an imperative, usu. to children and one's inferiors) come/go/stay
お出でなさい: (おいでなさい) - (used as a polite imperative)  come/go/stay; welcome!
お出でなさる: (おいでなさる) - to come/to go/to be (somewhere); (after the -te form of a verb) -ing
お出でになる: (おいでになる) - to be; to come; to go
お出掛け: (おでかけ) - (oft. used as a greeting in the form of お出かけですか？)  about to start out/just about to leave or go out; outing/trip
お初: (おはつ) - doing something for the first time (ever, in a season, etc.); new item/first crop of the season
お初をいただく: (おはつをいただく) - to eat something for the first time in the season
お初を頂く: (おはつをいただく) - to eat something for the first time in the season
お別れ会: (おわかれかい) - farewell party; goodbye party; send-off party
お利口: (おりこう) - well-behaved (of kids, animals, etc); obedient; good
お利巧: (おりこう) - well-behaved (of kids, animals, etc); obedient; good
お前: (おめえ) - you (formerly honorific, now sometimes derog. term referring to an equal or inferior); (おまえ only) presence (of a god, nobleman, etc.)
お前こそ: (おまえこそ) - (often derogatory) same to you/back at you/you too; you/you, indeed
お前さん: (おまえさん) - you; my dear; hey
お勉め品: (おつとめひん) - article offered at a bargain price; real bargain
お勤め: (おつとめ) - one's business; reading of scriptures before a (statue of) Buddha; bargain/discount; money paid to a prostitute or geisha
お勧め: (おすすめ) - recommendation; advice; suggestion; encouragement
お包み: (おくるみ) - covering used to wrap a baby
お化けの話: (おばけのはなし) - spooky tale; ghost story
お化け暦: (おばけごよみ) - private koyomi published illegally (Edo period)
お化け話: (おばけばなし) - ghost story; spooky story
お医者さんごっこ: (おいしゃさんごっこ) - playing doctor; children examining each other's genitals (often as a role play)
お印: (おしるし) - a show/blood-stained mucus discharge that happens during pregnancy up to two weeks before delivery; signature mark (crest) used by members of the Imperial family to mark their belongings; a sign (with honorific 'o')
お取り置き: (おとりおき) - layaway; lay-bye; layaway plan
お召し列車: (おめしれっしゃ) - Imperial train; royal train
お召し替え: (おめしかえ) - changing one's clothes; a change of clothes
お台場: (おだいば) - Odaiba (artificial island in Tokyo Bay)
お告げの祝日: (おつげのしゅくじつ) - Annunciation Day; Lady Day
お呪い: (おまじない) - good luck charm; uttered when using magic/abracadabra/presto
お呼びじゃない: (およびじゃない) - unasked for; unnecessary; uninvolved
お呼びでない: (およびでない) - unasked for; unnecessary; uninvolved
お喜び申しあげる: (およろこびもうしあげる) - (usu. 〜ます) to express pleasure on receiving news, etc.; to be glad to hear something
お喜び申し上げる: (およろこびもうしあげる) - (usu. 〜ます) to express pleasure on receiving news, etc.; to be glad to hear something
お国: (おくに) - your native country/your hometown; my home country (i.e. Japan); countryside/country; daimyo's territory (Edo period)
お国自慢: (おくにじまん) - boasting of one's hometown
お国言葉: (おくにことば) - national language; local dialect
お土産話: (おみやげばなし) - trip story; vacation story
お坊さん: (おぼうさん) - Buddhist priest/monk; son (of others)
